mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILES (DEPT_CD, POSITION_CD, EMP_CD, FILE_TYPE, FILE_PATH, FILE_NAME, FILE_HASH_NAME, FILE_EXT, FILE_SIZE, FILE_STATUS, REG_DT) VALUES (#{deptCd}, #{positionCd}, #{empCd}, #{fileType}, #{filePath}, #{fileName}, #{fileHashName}, #{fileExt}, #{fileSize}, #{fileStatus}, NOW())
